Your art is fueled by the levity that comes with bewilderment, peculiarity, and irony. Whenever a creature that you can see within 60ft of you rolls a natural 1 on an attack roll or skill check, gain 1 @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.ZVH8L715PTWTQLSE]{✨ Flair} point.
    You can only benefit from one Theme ability at a time. If you have multiple Theme abilities, you can change which one is active when you finish a rest and any time you spend a @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.ZVH8L715PTWTQLSE]{✨ Flair} point on an ability.
